verses.roman:
utkalera rājā puruṣottama-deva nāma
sei deśa jini' nila kariyā saṅgrāma

synonyms: utkalera—of Orissa; rājā—the King; puruṣottama-deva—Puruṣottama-deva; nāma—named; sei deśa—this country; jini'-conquering; nila—took; kariyā—executing; saṅgrāma—fight.
translation: Later there was a fight, and this country was conquered by King Puruṣottama-deva of Orissa.
